Summary: Orb-like object with glancing red and white lights
divs: sighting details1. i was going out to use my telescope at 3am. 2. it was clearly visible from my vantage point 3. i was not sure if it was a plane banking to the right at first. but them the lights became so erratic\mesmerizing, i was convinced it was unidentified. 4. you could not see the outline of the actual craft. just the mesmerizing array of lights moving about. they seemed to increase in intensity. there was not sound and considering it was only about 300-400 yards away, if it was a plane, i would think you would have heard it. 5. my feeling was i had definitely seen a ufo and was quite excited. i do see many planes coming in to the mansfield airport. but at that close distance, i can usually hear something. the commercial flights to logan are typically much much higher up. 6. the object went around the corner behind the trees, it did not accelerate away. it looked almost like it was surveying.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Bridgewater
There were no other sightings in Bridgewater on or around October 12th 2009
